articles.description: ICICI Securities is bullish on NMDC recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 180 in its research report dated September 13, 2023.
articles.content:
ICICI Securities research report on NMDC
We upgrade NMDC to BUY from ADD as: 1) Sales volume in FY24E may breach the 32-40mnte range; 2) long-term volume visibility is clearer as the roadmap for 100… [+959 chars]

articles.title: Samhi Hotels IPO: Issue sees tepid investor response on day 2; retail portion booked 34% | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Samhi Hotels IPO subscribed 7% on day 1, with retail portion at 34%, NII portion at 2%, and QIB portion with no subscription.
